page.title: 02ST.MARY THE VIRGIN.
page.content: SWAINSWICK CHURCH is called ST.MARY the VIRGIN. Sunday services are: Holy Communion_8.00 a.m. Sung Eucharist_10.00 a.m. Matins _11.15 a.m. Evensong _3.00 p.m. The number on rollwith Woolley is 105. The oldest part of the church is the doorway.Overthe doorway there is a Norman arch.The church has a saddle back roof and the tower is on the inside of the church. There are records of Cavaliers camping in the church in the 16th.C.as a base for the Battle of Lansdown.Famous people buried in the churchyard are JOHN WOOD the elder,JOHN WOOD the younger,(architects for Georgian Bath) Dr.John Haygarth who worked on vaccine for smallpox,at the same time as Edward Jenner.
